publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5358 John Swinburne: Welcome Gas Rebate—That the Parliament congratulates Scottish Gas for extending its Winter Rebate programme to include an additional 100,000 vulnerable senior citizens and notes that this 33⅓% increase in the numbers who will benefit is an example to all other fuel suppliers and an excellent step forward by Scottish Gas who listened to the representations from the Scottish Senior Citizens Unity Party and gave this positive response.

S2M-5358 John Swinburne: Welcome Gas Rebate—That the Parliament congratulates Scottish Gas for extending its Winter Rebate programme to include an additional 100,000 vulnerable senior citizens and notes that this 33⅓% increase in the numbers who will benefit is an example to all other fuel suppliers and an excellent step forward by Scottish Gas who listened to the representations from the Scottish Senior Citizens Unity Party and gave this positive response. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan*, Bruce Crawford*, Robin Harper*, Nora Radcliffe*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-5358 Welcome Gas Rebate (lodged on 20 December 2006) Chris Ballance*
S2M-5358 Welcome Gas Rebate (lodged on 20 December 2006) Dennis Canavan*
S2M-5358 Welcome Gas Rebate (lodged on 20 December 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-5358 Welcome Gas Rebate (lodged on 20 December 2006) Mr Jamie Stone*

S2M-5358 John Swinburne: Welcome Gas Rebate—That the Parliament congratulates Scottish Gas for extending its Winter Rebate programme to include an additional 100,000 vulnerable senior citizens and notes that this 33⅓% increase in the numbers who will benefit is an example to all other fuel suppliers and an excellent step forward by Scottish Gas who listened to the representations from the Scottish Senior Citizens Unity Party and gave this positive response. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Bruce Crawford, Robin Harper, Nora Radcliffe, Roseanna Cunningham, Chris Ballance, Dennis Canavan, Donald Gorrie, Mr Jamie Stone
